title: BloodConnect
subtitle: BloodConnect: Donate & Request Blood
description: A life-saving platform that connects blood donors with recipients in real-time, enabling fast, location-based blood requests and community support.
features: Post and respond to urgent blood donation requests
Users can post blood requests, and access an emergency contact list.
Includes user verification and a dedicated admin panel.

title: Finance Manager
subtitle: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A budget tracking app built with a custom UI, Room Database, and analytics charts. Developed for an anonymous client to manage daily expenses and financial goals.
features: Add and categorize income and expenses
Interactive analytics with pie and bar charts
Monthly budget planning and spending alerts

title: Vrid Blog App
